HomePage.faq1Answer: Yes, UPI PG is completely free for generating individual payment links. We believe in making payments simple and accessible for everyone.
HomePage.faq2Question: Do I need a bank account to use this?
HomePage.faq2Answer: You need a UPI ID, which is linked to your bank account via an app like Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, or your bank's own BHIM UPI app. Our service generates a link or QR code that the payer uses; we never ask for your bank account details.
HomePage.faq3Question: Can I generate a UPI QR code without an amount?
HomePage.faq3Answer: Currently, our tool is designed as a UPI QR code generator with amount included to simplify the payment process. You must specify an amount to generate a link.
HomePage.faq4Question: Is this an official NPCI or BHIM UPI QR code generator?
HomePage.faq4Answer: We are an independent platform that uses the standard UPI protocol defined by NPCI. We provide a simple interface to create payment links and QR codes that work across the entire UPI network.

AboutPage.title: About UPI PG
AboutPage.description: Instant, Sharable UPI Payment Links & QR Codes
AboutPage.p1: Welcome to UPI PG, your go-to solution for generating UPI payment links and QR codes in an instant. Our platform is the best free tool for everyone in India - from freelancers and small business owners to individuals who need a quick way to request money without the hassle of sharing bank details or phone numbers.
AboutPage.p2: Our mission is to make digital payments as seamless and accessible as possible. With UPI PG, you can create a personalized payment page with a unique QR code (with amount included) and a direct payment link. This can be done anonymously for quick, one-time transactions, or you can create an account to track your payment history, manage your links, and access more features.
AboutPage.feature1: No Login Required: Generate payment links on the fly without needing to create an account. The best free UPI QR code generator for quick use.
AboutPage.feature2: Customizable Links with Amount: Specify the amount, add notes, and even set an expiry date for your payment requests.
AboutPage.feature3: Sharable Pages: Each link generates a clean, professional payment page with a QR code and a button to pay via any BHIM UPI app.
AboutPage.feature4: User Dashboard: Sign up for a free account to view your payment history, mark payments as complete, and manage all your generated links in one place.
AboutPage.feature5: Secure & Private: We leverage the security of the UPI network as defined by NPCI. Your sensitive data is never stored on our servers, and we provide robust security rules to protect user information.
AboutPage.p3: UPI PG is built with modern, secure technology to ensure a reliable and safe experience. We are committed to continuously improving our platform and adding new features to serve you better.
AboutPage.p4: Thank you for choosing UPI PG. Create your first payment link today and experience the future of simple payments!

DevelopersPage.title: Developer Integrations
DevelopersPage.description: Integrate UPI payments into your website or application with ease.
DevelopersPage.embedWidgetP1: The easiest way to add a UPI payment form to your website is by using our embeddable widget. Just copy and paste the following HTML snippet into your webpage, and a fully functional payment form will appear. It's lightweight, secure, and requires no backend setup on your part.
DevelopersPage.embedWidgetP2: The widget will generate a unique payment page on UPI PG. You can adjust the height and width attributes to best fit your site's layout.
DevelopersPage.deepLinkP1: For more custom integrations, you can create UPI deep links (also known as UPI URIs) directly within your application. These links, when clicked on a mobile device, will open the user's default UPI app with the payment details pre-filled.
DevelopersPage.deepLinkP2: The format for a UPI link is as follows:
DevelopersPage.paramPA: Payee Address (Your UPI ID). This is the only mandatory parameter.
DevelopersPage.paramPN: Payee Name. The name of the person or business receiving the payment.
DevelopersPage.paramAM: Transaction Amount. The exact amount to be paid (e.g., 100.00).
DevelopersPage.paramTN: Transaction Note. A short description of the payment.
DevelopersPage.deepLinkP3: You can generate this link dynamically on your server or with client-side JavaScript and embed it in a button or hyperlink. Remember to URL-encode the parameter values.
DevelopersPage.qrCodeP1: You can also generate QR codes that contain the UPI deep link information. When a user scans this QR code with their UPI app, the payment details are automatically filled. This is perfect for invoices, product pages, or point-of-sale displays.
DevelopersPage.qrCodeP2: To do this, take the UPI deep link you constructed and URL-encode it. Then, use it as the data source for any QR code generation library or API. We use and recommend `qrserver.com` for its simplicity.
